description:
Tree work in a conservation area.

T1 Sycamore to fell  (this tree is the small dead tree next to the fence)
T2 Sycamore, thin by 20% remove dead wood    
T3 Ash, thin by 20% remove dead wood   
T4 Sorbus, thin by 20% remove dead wood    
T5 Ash, thin by 20% remove dead wood    
T6 Ash to fell (this tree is the spindley tree with a high crown)
T8 Ash, thin by 20% remove dead wood    
T9 Cherry, thin by 20% remove dead wood    
T10 crab apple, thin by 20% remove dead wood    
T11 Cherry, thin by 20% remove dead wood   
T12 Ash to thin by 20% and remove limb closest to block to lift and thin by 20% remove dead wood
decision_conditions: The council expects to see two replacement trees planted in a location close to the Ash and Sycamore that are to be removed, but further from the boundary wall to prevent damage in the future. The species and size is to be agreed with the Tree Preservation Officer prior to planting. Replacement trees are to be planted within one planting season.
